attributes.action: Force manufactures of Freeview decoders to include a option to hide adult/gambling channels.
attributes.additional_details: Its not enough to provide a pin number on adult channels, they should also provide an option to hide them. Its not right that when children are viewing the TV guide they can see a list of programs of this nature.  I don’t believe they should be blocked as adults can make their own choice, but it hardly what the kids reading the TV guide should see.
